00030 class SF_Database extends SF_Snob

00084     public function __construct( $db_host, $db_user, $db_pass, $db_name, $bOpen = true )
00085     {
00086         $this->m_dbConn = null;
00087         $this->m_dbHost = $db_host;
00088         $this->m_dbUser = $db_user;
00089         $this->m_dbPass = $db_pass;
00090         $this->m_dbName = $db_name;
00091 
00092         //  Open up if wanted
00093         if ( $bOpen )
00094            $this->openDatabase();
00095     }

00100     public function __get( $sProp )
00101     {
00102         if ( $sProp == "Pager" )
00103             return( $this->m_sPager );
00104             
00105         //  Pass along to parent...
00106         return( parent::__get( $sProp ) );
00107     }

00109     /***
00110     *@desc Opens the database connection
00111     */
00112     public function openDatabase()
00113     {
00114         if ( !$this->m_dbConn )
00115         {
00116             $this->m_dbConn = mysql_connect( $this->m_dbHost, $this->m_dbUser, $this->m_dbPass );
00117 
00118             if ( $this->m_dbConn && $this->m_dbName )
00119                 @mysql_select_db( $this->m_dbName, $this->m_dbConn );
00120         }
00121 
00122         return( $this->m_dbConn != null );
00123     }
00124 
00128     public function closeDatabase()
00129     {
00130         if ( $this->m_dbConn )
00131             mysql_close( $this->m_dbConn );
00132 
00133         $this->m_dbConn = null;
00134     }

00143     public function getColumn( $sSQL, $sColName )
00144     {
00145         $rs = mysql_query( $sSQL, $this->m_dbConn );
00146 
00147         $iRows = 0;
00148 
00149         if ( $rs )
00150             $iRows = mysql_numrows( $rs );
00151 
00152         if ( $iRows > 0 )
00153             return( mysql_result( $rs, 0, $sColName ) );
00154 
00155         return( null );
00156     }
00157 
00164     public function getRecordset( $sSQL, $bAutoFetch = true )
00165     {
00166         $rs = null;
00167 
00168         $this->debug( "getRecordset: " . $sSQL );
00169         
00170         $rs = mysql_query( $sSQL, $this->m_dbConn );
00171 
00172         if ( $rs && $bAutoFetch )
00173             return( mysql_fetch_array( $rs ) );
00174 
00175         return( $rs );
00176     }
00177 
00184     public function execSQL( $sSQL )
00185     {
00186         $this->debug( "execSQL: " . $sSQL );
00187         $rs = mysql_query( $sSQL, $this->m_dbConn );
00188         $rc = mysql_affected_rows( $this->m_dbConn );
00189         return( $rc );
00190     }
00191 
00198     public function execute( $sSQL )
00199     {
00200         return( $this->getRecordset( $sSQL, false ) );
00201     }
00202 
00208     public function lastInsertId()
00209     {
00210         return( mysql_insert_id( $this->m_dbConn ) );
00211     }

00216     public function getPagedRecordset( $sSQL, $bFetch, $iCurPage, $sTable, $sLink, $sQueryString = "" )
00217     {
00218         //  Counting the offset
00219         $iOffset = ( $this->m_iCurPage - 1 ) * $this->m_iPerPage;
00220         $sSQL .= " limit $iOffset, {$this->m_iPerPage}";
00221         $rs = $this->getRecordset( $sSQL, $bFetch );
00222 
00223         $iCount = $this->getColumn( "select count(1) as num_rows from $sTable", "num_rows" );
00224 
00225         //  How many pages we have when using paging?
00226         $iMaxPage = ceil( $iCount / $this->m_iPerPage );
00227 
00228         $self = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00229 
00230         if ( $this->m_iCurPage > 1 )
00231         {
00232             $iPage = $this->m_iCurPage - 1;
00233             $sPrevLink = "page=$iPage";
00234             $sFirstLink = "page=1";
00235         }
00236         else
00237         {
00238             $sPrevLink = "";
00239             $sFirstLink = "";
00240         }
00241 
00242         if ( $this->m_iCurPage < $iMaxPage )
00243         {
00244             $iPage = $this->m_iCurPage + 1;
00245             $sNextLink = "page=$iPage";
00246             $sLastLink = "page=$iMaxPage";
00247         }
00248         else
00249         {
00250             $sNextLink = "";
00251             $sLastLink = "";
00252         }
00253 
00254         $sOut = "";
00255 
00256         if ( $sFirstLink != "" )
00257             $sOut .= "<a href=\"$sLink" . ( $sQueryString != "" ? $sQueryString . "&" : "?" ) . $sFirstLink . "\"><<</a>&nbsp;";
00258         else
00259             $sOut .= "<<&nbsp;";
00260 
00261         if ( $sPrevLink != "" )
00262             $sOut .= "<a href=\"$sLink" . ( $sQueryString != "" ? $sQueryString . "&" : "?" ) . $sPrevLink . "\"><</a>&nbsp;";
00263         else
00264             $sOut .= "<&nbsp;";
00265 
00266         $sOut .= "&nbsp;{$this->m_iCurPage} of {$iMaxPage}&nbsp;";
00267 
00268         if ( $sNextLink != "" )
00269             $sOut .= "<a href=\"$sLink" . ( $sQueryString != "" ? $sQueryString . "&" : "?" ) . $sNextLink . "\">></a>&nbsp;";
00270         else
00271             $sOut .= ">&nbsp;";
00272 
00273         if ( $sLastLink != "" )
00274             $sOut .= "<a href=\"$sLink" . ( $sQueryString != "" ? $sQueryString . "&" : "?" ) . $sLastLink . "\">>></a>&nbsp;";
00275         else
00276             $sOut .= ">>&nbsp;";
00277 
00278         $this->m_sPager = $sOut;
00279 
00280         return( $rs );
00281     }

00286     public function getCodeDescription( $lCodeUID, $sTable = "code_t" )
00287     {
00288         $rs = $this->getRecordset( "select code_desc_text from $sTable where code_uid = $lCodeUID" );
00289         if ( $rs )
00290         {
00291             return( $rs['code_desc_text'] );
00292         }
00293 
00294         return( '' );
00295     }
